ViewAttribute.Name: poQuantity
ViewAttribute.Expression: select quantity from po_lines_all a where a.po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id

ViewAttribute.Name: poPrice
ViewAttribute.Expression: select unit_price from po_lines_all a where po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id

ViewAttribute.Name: poShipment
ViewAttribute.Expression: select shipment_num from po_line_locations_all where po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id

ViewAttribute.Name: poLine
ViewAttribute.Expression: select line_num from po_lines_all a where a.po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id

ViewAttribute.Name: poNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: select segment1 from po_headers_all a where a.po_header_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_header_id

ViewAttribute.Name: sku
ViewAttribute.Expression: select segment1 from mtl_system_items_b a where a.inventory_item_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.inventory_item_id and a.organization_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.ship_to_location_id

ViewAttribute.Name: hold
ViewAttribute.Expression: select decode(count(hold_id),0,null,'Y') from ap_holds_all a where a.line_location_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_location_id

ViewAttribute.Name: qtyHoldAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: select (ApInvoiceLinesEO.quantity_invoiced-a.quantity)*a.unit_price from po_lines_all a where a.po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id

ViewAttribute.Name: priceHoldAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: select (ApInvoiceLinesEO.unit_price-a.unit_price)*ApInvoiceLinesEO.quantity_invoiced from po_lines_all a where a.po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id

ViewAttribute.Name: holdName
ViewAttribute.Expression: select listagg(hold_lookup_code,'/') within group (order by a.line_location_id) from ap_holds_all a where a.line_location_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_location_id

ViewAttribute.Name: holdDate
ViewAttribute.Expression: select min(hold_date) from ap_holds_all a where a.line_location_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_location_id

ViewAttribute.Name: chargeAccount
ViewAttribute.Expression: select g.segment1 ||'.'||g.segment2||'.'||g.segment3||'.'||g.segment4||'.'||g.segment5||'.'||g.segment6||'.'||g.segment7 from gl_code_combinations g, po.po_distributions_all d where d.po_line_id=ApInvoiceLinesEO.po_line_id and g.code_combination_id=d.code_combination_id
